name: Get Your Numbers Right!
description:
------ Get your numbers right! - A puzzle solving game ------

100 % solvable in all cases

Click on a tile up / down / right or left to move it to the empty place (place with no tile in the 4 x 4 matrix) . All the tiles are jumbled up, arrange them in ascending order from 1 - 15 ( left to right, top to bottom) to win the game!

hmm.. Most will say impossible but it is not!
